short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Search all ad libraries to see all of your competitions ads in one click!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Looking at your competitors website? Two clicks and you can see all active paid ads running across Google, Facebook & Instagram and LinkedIn! 

Use this information to understand what kind of ads they're running to take inspiration and find ways to compete in the eyes of your customer.

Easily adjust the searched company name before clicking to see all the ads. 

Each platform sometimes requires a slight adjustment to the search once you arrive.
